name: Social Fixation
overview:
Social Fixation provides simple push-button installation of apps that convert fans into paying customers.

Social Fixation (www.socialfixation.com) is the worldwide leader in innovative and simple social media apps geared for small to medium sized businesses. Social Fixation is the crusader in helping put small businesses back in business. Using the latest technology available in conjunction with proprietary development, Social Fixation has taken complex applications and made them available into simple push-button installations allowing small business owners to be immediately competitive with their markets larger counterparts. The company is committed to leveling the playing field so companyâ€™s can engage in social media strategies with confidence. Social Fixation knows the hesitation of small to medium size businesses entering into a social media launch and does everything to assure its members will achieve success through powerful educational tools, cutting edge apps, and simplicity. All Social Fixation products are guaranteed to generate positive results.
